flawed_nl_solution:
If he had 200 fish and sells 50, he is left with 200 - 50 = <<200-50=150>>150 fish
If a third of them get spoiled 1/3 * 150 = <<150*1/3=50>>50 fish get spoiled
The remaining number of fish is now 150 - 50 = <<150-50=1000>>1000
He then gets 200 more to make 1000 + 200 = <<1000+200=1200>>1200 fish

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
